actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the widows of certain former members of the Armed forces of the United States to use the services and facilities of post exchanges and commissaries.

summary.text: Authorizes the widows of specified former members of the armed forces of the United States to use the services and facilities of post exchanges and commissaries. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 1041)

titles.title: A bill to authorize the widows of certain former members of the Armed forces of the United States to use the services and facilities of post exchanges and commissaries.
